p: Mexico has 32 states, which are divided into four zones: the north zone (Baja California, Baja California Sur, Chihuahua, Coahuila, Durango, Nuevo Leon, Sinaloa, Sonora, Tamaulipas and Zacatecas), center zone (Aguascalientes, Colima, Ciudad de Mexico, Guanajuato, Hidalgo, Jalisco, Mexico, Michoacan, Morelos, Nayarit, Queretaro, San Luis Potosi, Tlaxcala), southeast zone (Chiapas, Guerrero, Oaxaca, Puebla, Tabasco, Veracruz) and peninsula zone (Campeche, Quintana Roo and Yucatan). The circulation of HMPV was observed predominantly in the states of the north and the center zones. The states of the southeast and the peninsula zones showed less circulation. The same pattern was observed when comparing age groups to zones ( Figure 4 and Figure 5).
